ygData.subject: Re: Decadel, the Lavacons
ygData.msgSnippet: Squizzy:: She looked around at the and around the console.  She saw a bunch of buttons around the speaker on the console.  She shook her head. No, not those

Squizzy::

She looked around at the and around the console.  She saw a bunch of 
buttons around the speaker on the console.  She shook her head."No, 
not those buttons,"  She kept looking and saw a panel that was 
connected to a columb that led deeper into the front of the craft.  
She shook her head again.  She couldn't remember how these things 
were put together.  Too much of her prgramming had been scrambled.  
She kept looking and then turned her eyes to her seat.  She looked 
down on hte left side of the seat and saw a little lever near the 
base of the seat.  She looked and saw a wire connected from the lever 
to something under her seat.  She felt her spark jump at the notion 
of her idea being right.  She then gave a deep sigh and prayed to the 
matrix that her hunch would be right.  She lowered her hand and 
wrapped her hand around the lever.  She held the lever with a death 
grip.  She then closed her eyes and held her breath.  She made one 
last prayer before pulling the lever.

(NO, she didn't pull the lever.  She was just holding it at this 
point.  But if they land before she pulls it and pulled out of the 
craft and not on her own free will, she will pull the lever just 
because she has such a tight grip on it. This all on that hunch that 
the lever she is holding is the eject lever.  But that is up to you 
Yanshosh)
